content: {"version":2,"machineId":"f401bf17-d130-4c38-b2c5-49f0b4355a79","content":"{\"linux\":\"// Place your key bindings in this file to override the defaults\\n[\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+shift+b\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.toggleActivityBarVisibility\\\"\\n      },\\n      {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+alt+down\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"cursorColumnSelectDown\\\"\\n      },\\n      {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+alt+up\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"cursorColumnSelectUp\\\"\\n      },\\n      {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"shift+enter\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"extension.aceJump\\\"\\n      }\\n]\"}"}
